main.title: Every tool you need to work with PDFs in one place
main.subtitle: One location for all the tools you need to work with PDFs. You have access to all the tools that are required to use PDFs. Each is totally free and simple to use. You may combine, divide, compress, convert, rotate, unlock, and watermark PDF files with only a few clicks.

details.title: Merge PDF
details.description: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger available.

details.title: Split PDF
details.description: Separate one page or a whole set for easy conversion into independent PDF files.

details.title: Compress PDF
details.description: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal PDF quality.

details.title: Excel to PDF
details.description: Make EXCEL spreadsheets easy to read by converting them to PDF.

details.title: PDF to JPG
details.description: Convert each PDF page into a JPG or extract all images contained in a PDF.

details.title: JPG to PDF
details.description: Convert JPG images to PDF in seconds. Easily adjust orientation and margins.

details.title: Watermark
details.description: Stamp an image or text over your PDF in seconds. Choose the typography, transparency and position.

details.title: Rotate PDF
details.description: Rotate your PDFs the way you need them. You can even rotate multiple PDFs at once!

details.title: Unlock PDF
details.description: Remove PDF password security, giving you the freedom to use your PDFs as you want.

details.title: Protect PDF
details.description: Protect PDF files with a password. Encrypt PDF documents to prevent unauthorized access.

details.title: Repair PDF
details.description: Repair a damaged PDF and recover data from corrupt PDF. Fix PDF files with our Repair tool.

premium.heading: Premium Offers More
premium.subHeading: With batch processing of data, you may finish tasks more quickly.
premium.subHeading1: You can also use OCR to convert scanned documents and e-sign contracts for your organization.

merge.title: Merge PDF files
merge.subTitle: Combine PDFs in the order you want with the easiest PDF merger available.

split.title: Split PDF file
split.subTitle: Separate one page or a whole set for easy conversion into independent PDF files.

compress.title: Compress PDF files
compress.subTitle: Reduce file size while optimizing for maximal PDF quality.

jpg_to_pdf.title: JPG to PDF
jpg_to_pdf.subTitle: Convert JPG images to PDF in seconds. Easily adjust orientation and margins.

excel_to_pdf.title: Convert EXCEL to PDF
excel_to_pdf.subTitle: Make EXCEL spreadsheets easy to read by converting them to PDF.

pdf_to_jpg.title: PDF to JPG
pdf_to_jpg.subTitle: Convert each PDF page into a JPG or extract all images contained in a PDF.

repair.title: Repair PDF file
repair.subTitle: Upload a corrupt PDF and we will try to fix it. Depending on how much the PDF is damaged we will be able to recover it partially or completely.

rotate.title: Rotate PDF
rotate.subTitle: Rotate your PDFs the way you need them. You can even rotate multiple PDFs at once!

watermark.title: Add watermark into a PDF
watermark.subTitle: Stamp an image or text over your PDF in seconds. Choose the typography, transparency and position.

unlock.title: Unlock PDF
unlock.subTitle: Remove PDF password security, giving you the freedom to use your PDFs as you want.

protect.title: Protect PDF file
protect.subTitle: Encrypt your PDF with a password to keep sensitive data confidential.
